|brand = Linksys |model = MX5300 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = (MX5) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 7 April 2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Linksys_MX5300 |wlclass = AX5300 |series = Velop |type = wireless system, mesh node |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-03448 |icid = 3839A-03448 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 48SAQA01.0GA |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8072A; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 2.2 GHz <!-- 2.0 GHz 2.2 GHz 1.4 GHz (+ NPU @1.7GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W29N04GZBIBA; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 15:89:96 |oui = 15:89:96
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, OFDMA, WPA3, Bluetooth 5.0, Mesh, ZigBee, Thread, RTC w/ battery backup, heatsink, |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85340-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz WLAN AX FEM;Skyworks;SKY85755-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz WLAN AC FEM;Skyworks;SKY85746-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz WLAN AC SoC;Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984;;1; ,,, Bluetooth 5.0, Zigbee SoC;Qualcomm Atheros;QCA4024;;1; ,,, 2.4GHz WLAN BT FEM;Skyworks (SiGe);SE2433T-R;;1; ,,, Serial Real Time Clock Chip;STMicro;M41T00S;;1; ,,, 4MB Flash SPI NOR Chip;Macronix;MX25R3235F;;1; ,,, Power Management IC;Qualcomm;PMP8074;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = SAQA0 |manuf_rev = 1.0GA |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/16/2019 |estreldate = 10/23/2019 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07Z5NZ9CQ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5024; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |axqam1 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad1ax = 1148 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam3 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad3ac = 1733 |nqam3 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48SAQA01.0GA" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. {{See also|List of Linksys Wireless Devices|Wistron NeWeb}} <small> :Linksys is ''marketing'' this as AX5300 but it is not yet clear where this number comes from :Wi-Fi Technology: ''AX5300 MU-MIMO Tri-Band Gigabit Router'' (1148+2402+1733Mbps) </small> <!--{{FCC ST|02/12/2020|indexme.}}--> * Web GUI: https://linksyssmartwifi.com
===Models=== *[[Linksys MX5 Velop AX]] (AX5300) - Velop AX Whole Home WiFi 6 System *[[Linksys MX10 Velop AX]] (AX5300) - Velop AX Whole Home WiFi 6 System *[[Linksys MX4200]] (AX4200) • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8174 (4x 1.4GHz) • [https://spec.wifi-lifestyle.com/velop-mx12600-ax4200-tri-band-mesh-wifi-6-system/ Spec.] *[[Linksys MX5300]] (AX5300) • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072A (4x 2.2GHz) • [https://www.acwifi.net/10155.html TD] *[[Linksys MX8500]] (MX85EC, MX85MS, MX85WH) - Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6E Router :WFA ID: WFA109988 (2021-01-14) • Wi-Fi 6E 802.11ax (2.4/5/6GHz)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://spec.wifi-lifestyle.com/linksys-mx10-velop-ax-whole-home-wifi-6-system/ ''Linksys MX10 WiFi 6 System'' on '''WiFi-Lifestyle'''] *[https://www.acwifi.net/10155.html ''Linksys MX5300 WiFi 6 System'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) <!-- *[https://www.acwifi.net/13681.html ''Xiaomi Mi Router AX9000'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) *[https://www.acwifi.net/12621.html ''Xiaomi Mi Router AX6000'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) *[https://www.acwifi.net/9478.html ''Xiaomi Mi Router AX3600'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) -->

==See also== :;[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] • [[Linksys]] • [https://www.linksys.com/us/c/wireless-routers/ Wireless Routers] *[[Linksys AXE8400]] (AX8400) • CES2021 ($450/$850/$1200) • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/01/12/linksys-axe8400-is-the-worlds-first-wifi-6e-router/ Review] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/qualcomm-networking-pro-1210-platform ''Networking Pro 1210''] Quad-core (ARM-Cortex A53) <!-- :System Memory: TBD DDR3/DDR4 (1GB ?); Storage: TBD (256MB ?) :Connectivity: 1x WAN (5GbE), 4x LAN (1GbE) Gigabit Ethernet ports :Wi-Fi: Tri-band: 4.8Gbps (6GHz), 2.4Gbps (5GHz), 1.2Gbps (2.4GHz) :Wi-Fi 6E (6GHz) with 14x 80MHz channels / 7x 160MHz channels :Wi-Fi 6 (2.4GHz/5GHz), 802.11ac (Wave 2), 802.11n, 802.11a/b/g :WiFi clients: up to 64 clients; USB: 1x USB 3.0 ports --> *[[Linksys E8450]] (AX3200) - AX3200 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6 Router • [https://www.acwifi.net/12316.html Review] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7622/MT7615N/MT7915A (MT7911AN/MT7975AN) :Wi-Fi: 800Mbps (2.4GHz), 2400Mbps (5GHz); WAN/LAN: 1x/4x (1GbE)
*[[Linksys MR7350]] (AX1800) - Max-Stream Mesh WiFi 6 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR7350/ PPage] :FCC ID: Q87-08151 (2020-03-31) • Dual-Band 802.11ax Wireless Router *[[Linksys MR7500]] (MR75WH) - AXE6600 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6E Mesh Router :WFA ID: WFA111136 (2021-03-16) • Wi-Fi 6E 802.11ax (2.4/5/6GHz) <!-- Linux 4.4.60 --> *[[Linksys MR8300]] (AC2200) - Dual-Band Mesh WiFi 5 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR8300/ PPage] *[[Linksys MR9000]] (AC3000) - Dual-Band Mesh WiFi 5 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR9000/ PPage] *[[Linksys MR9600]] (AX6000) - Dual-Band Mesh WiFi 6 Router • [https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-MR9600/ PPage] :CPU: 1.8GHz Quad Core, WAN/LAN: 1x/4x 1GbE, 2x USB 3.0 • [https://spec.wifi-lifestyle.com/linksys-mr9600-dual-band-mesh-wifi-6-router/ Spec.] <!-- *[[Xiaomi Mi AX1800]] (MiWiFi M59) • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/05/18/most-affordable-wifi-6-router-60-xiaomi-router-ax1800/ Review] *[[Xiaomi Mi AX3600]] (AIoT M60) • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/02/14/xiaomi-aiot-router-ax3600-wifi-6-router-sells-for-135/ Review] *[[Xiaomi Mi AX6000]] (AIoT M72) • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/01/13/xiaomi-mi-ax6000-wifi-6-enhanced-router-sells-for-92-in-china/ Review] *[[Xiaomi Mi AX9000]] (AIoT M70) • [https://www.acwifi.net/13681.html Review] -->
